primaryPhylogenyCitation.title: Phylogeny of the Carnivora: basal relationships among the carnivoramorphans, and assessment of the position of “Miacoidea” relative to crown-clade Carnivora.

phylorefs.label: Pan-Carnivora
phylorefs.dwc:scientificNameAuthorship: Flynn, J. J., Wyss, A. R., Wolsan, M.
phylorefs.cladeDefinition: The total clade composed of the crown clade Carnivora and all extinct organisms or species sharing a more recent common ancestor with Carnivora than with any extant organisms or species that are not members of Carnivora.
